The map of whatever morality has been made in Arabia while the Holy Prophet has been abundant is hit in Surat al -Ma'aul.That is, it was not that they did not have any values ​​from the end, but that there is a sloping values ​​and that there are some Chinese, whose reality is not true.As our situation is today, the rituals are not unheard of, the philosophy is not left, then it has come to them that since they had lost the humiliation of the punishment, you saw the person who had no knowledge of the world.There is no life other than the life of this world.We live ourselves.We live ourselves, and there is no one except the royal rotation of the royal rotation.We do not believe in God and the people.There are also people.It is evident that the character of this person who is together with the reward will be that it will be a man of luxury.The one who shows the orphan to the orphan is the one who shows the benefit of the orphan, who is willing to feed himself and no one is ready to feed him.That is, I will ask him, so no one will tell me why you do not feed Fawllal -ul -Mumslinin.It should be eliminated by eliminating all these troubles and just coming into the world just as Allah sent us, then come to the house of Allah, then come in the same way as Allah sent us to the world.Innovation is not there with us, but it is that the spirit of the Holy Spirit is praying, if the heart of the Holy Prophet is praying.In the meantime, Salathan al -Zuhun -ul -Alazin, and if one does good deeds, so that it is a very generous man to show him some fame, but his personality has come to the fore.If desired, he had no judge, salt was given, but they would also come to these things and get a dizzy.
